message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $22,000.  I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe it's a great deal, but I need to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  However, $11,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This offer reflects the value it brings.
I understand the product's value, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you at $14,000. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this. $14,000 is close, but I need to get at least $16,000 for this product.  I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment at this price.
I'm starting to see the value in the product, but I need to be careful with my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $13,500. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
